name: Overripe Flamegranate
description: A strange Flamegranate obtained after defeating the Gluttonous YumkasaurMountain King.  Normally, Flamegranates that keep growing once they have already ripenedsimply fall into the mud and rot. But Flamegranates that have fallen from theMountain King's mane, perhaps owing to the unique internal temperatureconditions, exhibit a rarely-seen "Overripe" state. Flamegranates in thisstate are stable, phlogiston-packed, brightly colored, and possess a rich andhighly distinctive flavor.
